widget.label: Log In Form
widget.tooltip: Enter your log in information below then click the Log In button.
widget.help: This form allows you to log in your Snap! website. Enter your log in name and password and then click on Log In to get a log in session.

widget.label: Email
widget.tooltip: Enter your email address to log in your Snap! Website account.
widget.help: Enter the email address you used to register with Snap! All the Snap! Websites run by Made to Order Software Corp. allow you to use the same log in credentials.

widget.label: Password
widget.tooltip: Enter your password, if you forgot your password, just the link below to request a change.
widget.help: Enter the password you used while registering with Snap! Your password is the same for all the Snap! Websites run by Made to Order Software Corp.

widget.label: Forgot Password
widget.tooltip: Forgot your password? Click on this link to request Snap! to send you a link to change it with a new one.
widget.help: You use so many websites with an account... and each one has to have a different password! So it can be easy to forget the password for a given website. We store passwords in a one way encryption mechanism (i.e. we cannot decrypt it) so if you forget it, we can only offer you to replace it. This is done using the form this link sends you to.

widget.label: Register
widget.tooltip: No account yet? Register your own Snap! account now.
widget.help: To log in a Snap! account, you first have to register an account. Click on this link if you don't already have an account. If you are not sure, you can always try the Forgot Password link. It will tell you whether we know your email address.

widget.label: Remember Me
widget.tooltip: Select this checkbox to let your browser record a long time cookie. This way you can come back to your Snap! account(s) without having to log back in everytime.
widget.help: By checking this box you agree to have Snap! save a full session cookie which let you come back to your website over and over again. By not selecting the checkbox, you still get a cookie, but it will only last 2 hours unless your use your website constantly.

widget.label: OK
widget.tooltip: Enter your credentials to log into the site.
widget.help: Enter your user name and password, and then click the LOGIN button. This will log your user into the site.

widget.label: Cancel
widget.tooltip: Click here to return to the home page
widget.help: Long description that goes in the help box explaining why you'd want to click Cancel.
